GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit db728a891f9177b044aaca89b678f6b5e24d5cc3. For more details please see the references link.
